nodes.text: @hear_and_yield The Dutch National Opera have done a contemporary reimagining of Kurt Weill's Seven Deadly Sins which looks amazing.\n\nAnd the other eludes Me but I'll let you know when it oops into My head. 😊

@hear_and_yield There are 2 new operas I really want to see that are far more contemporary. I'll have to find the names for you. One's about seven deadly sins in 21st century and the other... I can't remember. I saved it somewhere.
@MistressMolinky Exquisite opera. Just wish there was less patriarchy and racism in most of the plots.
@hear_and_yield Definitely. I remember the first time I saw Madame Butterfly. It was exquisite.
@MistressMolinky To be honest I would much rather be gifted experiences these days. Stuff is nice but I try not to be too consumerist. Besides, live music is the way to my soul.
@hear_and_yield The Royal Opera House? What an excellent gift. I never thought to include experiences and I love the arts. You deserve to be spoiled like the Lady you are. 😘
You can't always get what you want, but you can always work to provide for others.\nhttps://t.co/zMuDbGkFjM https://t.co/6lDG46P0F0
